9.24.20  6:17 pm   hey bill is this really you?

9.24.20  5:58 pm   What was your first instrument that you played

     and have you had a teacher that is not yourself?

9.24.20  5:18 pm   Hey bro, I can get not-bad melodies, but my harmonic sense is still lowkey crap. I only got to make something good sounding with the Andalusian cadence (with a few invs), but either I got something embarrassingly sounding, or I ditch the harmony entirely, and I can work it out fine that way...
Got any tips?
9.24.20  4:45 pm   why dont you like being chastised
9.24.20  4:19 pm   At what point did you think to yourself "yeah, I've definitely got my own style now" and was it an intentional thing? Or did it just happen?
9.24.20  4:02 pm   is it wierd that i always have a song in my head, like all the time?

9.24.20  3:40 pm   Hey Bill, I'm studying to become a musician.  I'm really into music theory, and I still can't figure out what your secret is.  What chords are you using to get that very specific sound you have, and how do they relate to each other?

you are truly an inspiration and i hope your new song is going well!
